title: Podcast with Joe Salama: "Why we must never forget: recognizing antisemitism today"
body:
In a weekly podcast for employees, Deutsche Bank's head of communications, Jörg Eigendorf, talks to bank employees about their work and the topics that move them. This time he interviewed Joe Salama, Global Head of Litigation & Regulatory Enforcement.
Please click on the picture below to listen to the podcast.
